description: Module that allows you to sanction users who send links.

action.description: Set the action to take when a user sends a link.

action.name: action
action.description: Action to take when a user sends a link.

time.name: time
time.description: Time of the action (in case of being temporary).

filo.description: Enable or disable bypassing of links from Filo domains.

action.name: action
action.description: Enable or disable bypassing of links from Filo domains.

discord.description: Enable or disable bypassing of links from Discord domains.

action.name: action
action.description: Enable or disable bypassing of links from Discord domains.

link.description: Add or remove a link from the list of ignored links.

action.name: action
action.description: Action you want to carry out.

link.name: link
link.description: Link that you want to add or remove to the list of ignored links.

channel.description: Add or remove a channel from the list of ignored channels.

action.name: action
action.description: Action you want to carry out.

channel.description: Channel from the module's channel bypass list.

role.description: Add or remove a role from the list of ignored roles.

action.name: action
action.description: Action you want to carry out.

role.description: Role from the module's role bypass list.

docs.description: Get the link of the anti-external-links module documentation.

view.description: View the settings of the anti-external-links module.

reset.description: Restores the module settings to the original ones (data can't be recovered).

confirmation.name: confirmation
confirmation.description: Are you really sure you want to reset the data for this module?
